subject: Vam Haptic after Firmware Update Not going
description_text:
Hello.. my vam Haptic after Last Firmware Updatendoes Not working . Firmware failure ? In the Test only Work throttle.. but other dont Work.. mfg

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin Toman,  Are you using SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2? The firmware versions should be CPU1: 2.0.5 and CPU2: 2.0.4. Please send me a screenshot so I can confirm your versions, and also provide your VAM order number.

Hey. Yes, I tested both the new and the old firmware. One motor worked briefly, then none of them did. I love this Pedals and the Haptic  please Help me


Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Sorry a forgot my Order number
Bestellung aufgegeben
Bestellnummer
29. September 2025
303-4491795-4085146


Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Ich war echt begeistert davon , bis nach dem letzten Update. Davor hatte ich nie Probleme damit gehabt. Würde mich sehr freuen wenn es eine Lösung geben würde. Würde auch auf die VAM pro aufzahlen. Liebe Grüße Toman

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Martin Toman,  Did you purchase two VAM motors? Did one of them start malfunctioning and get damaged after the firmware update, or was it already damaged and the update couldn’t fix it? We will send you a replacement VAM motor tomorrow. Please provide the contact name, phone number, and delivery address.

I purchased three and after the Firmware Update damaged.. i think the Firmware broken my VAM's.

Martin Toman
Ortsstrasse 82/3/3
2331 Vösendorf

Phone: +436603851057

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Martin Toman,  So currently only one of them is damaged, and you need a replacement for that one, right?

All three damaged. 2 total damaged and one isnthe Haptic so smart

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Martin Toman,  Are all three VAMs damaged? Please provide a test video via Google Drive and set the appropriate access permissions. The video should simply show the motor vibration test, allowing us to observe the motor’s vibration sound and feedback.

Are you kidding me? I'm already really angry that they broke at all, and then I'm supposed to play around with them and make videos. Now I'm supposed to make proof videos.

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Send me new VAM's or Not..

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Martin Toman,  We need to replace the VAM units, and an evaluation video of the damaged VAMs is required. Please simply record videos of the three VAM units showing no response during vibration tests and send them to us. Once verified, we will send three new VAM units. This is a necessary procedure, and we appreciate your understanding.
